subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Jon Dorenbos, a long snapper, signed a five-year contract extension Saturday with Philadelphia. Dorenbos, 27, was signed late last season after Mike Bartrum was injured. He has played 22 games with the Eagles. He previously played for Buffalo and Tennessee.
